mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS SEQ, ROLES AS ROLES FROM TB_AUTH WHERE COMPANY_SEQ = #{companySeq}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (COMPANY_SEQ, ORGAN_SEQ, AUTH_SEQ, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL) VALUES (#{companySeq}, #{organSeq}, #{authSeq}, #{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ AS SEQ, COMPANY_SEQ AS COMPANYSEQ, ORGAN_SEQ AS ORGANSEQ, AUTH_SEQ AS AUTHSEQ, ID AS USERID, PASSWORD AS USERPASS, NAME AS USERNAME, PHONE AS USERPHONE, EMAIL AS USEREMAIL, USE_YN AS USEYN, CREATE_DATE AS CREATEDATE, MODIFY_DATE AS MODIFYDATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{userPass}
